title: Luxury Ranch Stay in Monterey’s Wine Country
description: Live the Californian dream with a stay at Carmel Valley Ranch, a luxurious ranch property set amid 500 acres of lush greenery in the wine country of Monterey county. Perfect for a peaceful break during a California road trip or as a standalone holiday, stay in a stunning Santa Lucia Studio room and benefit from an on-site spa, three dining venues spearheaded by award-winning executive chef Tim Wood, the ranch’s private vineyard and multiple wholesome outdoor activities, including golf, tennis, hiking and archery. Included in your escape is daily breakfast for two, one complimentary cocktail per person and USD$50 resort credit.
offer_address: 1 Old Ranch Rd, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93923, USA
